BROOK-R.BK.long_name: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited
BROOK-R.BK.summary: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in business and financial consulting, and investment activities in Thailand and internationally. The company provides investment banking and financial consulting services, such as mergers and acquisitions, loan refinancing, rehabilitation, and other capital raising on equity and debt securities; planning and negotiations services; and company valuation and advisory services on investments and joint ventures to multinational companies. It also offers capital for growing companies and leveraged buy-outs; and research services, including industrial market research, B2B market survey, customer satisfaction research, industry and trade surveys, market feasibility study, acquisition research, customized market intelligence/in-depth research, and product and service concept/development test. In addition, the company provides real estate consultancy services comprising specialized services in industrial and commercial real estate properties; transaction, advisory, location consulting, asset recovery, and special property services; and disposition and acquisition, advisory and consulting, and property management services. Further, it offers feasibility study, business plan and strategy, company structure and financing, management consultancy, and financial restructuring services for SME firms; and capital management services. Additionally, the company provides fund management services for foreign investors. The Brooker Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NFPH.F.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, Non-Life Insurance Business, Asset Management Business, and Hire Purchase and Leasing Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management services; securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides non-life insurance products in the areas of fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous; life and health insurance products to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and lending services for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TH.BK.long_name: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited
TH.BK.summary: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes newspapers in Thailand. The company also provides publishing and printing services; and short-term funds in the form of factoring, loans, and leasing services. In addition, it offers space rental for products and services business; and engages in the investment business. The company was formerly known as Tong Hua Communications Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited in May 2016. Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
